docs.text: John Pellman's Curated and Organized Github Stars This repo hosts a static site that displays exported data from the Astral app, which is used for the curation / tagging of Github stars. I add raw data that has been exported from Astral manually ( jpellman_astral_data.json ), a build script processes this data and converts it into a set of Markdown documents, and then MkDocs generates the static site.
docs.title: John Pellman's Curated and Organized Github Stars
